activities: Anixter International Inc. and its U.S. subsidiaries and affiliates ("Anixter") processes personal information about its employees including name, business and personal contact information, personal identification number, work experience, compensation, financial information, health insurance and benefits information, and sensitive personal information such as gender, ethnic origin and health information.  This processing is done for the purposes of staffing, professional evaluation, travel arrangements, administrative supervision, compensation decisions and benefits programs. Anixter will also receive or collect personal information about the employees of service providers and customers including business contact and financial information for the purpose of conducting business transactions with corporate clients.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Liechtenstein, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Electronic Components - (ELC)General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)Security & Safety Equipment - (SEC)
personaldata: Organization, Customer.  This includes manually-processed data.
